participant_1.background:
I drive a convertible because it gives me the freedom to enjoy the open air and my ice cream.
I am a graduate student trying to manage my anxiety disorder.
i have a big family.
sometimes i go to yoga classes.
I spent most of last year in my workshop, building furniture.

participant_2.background:
I now enjoy gardening and cooking with my favorite ingredients.
my family came from greece in the 1950s.
I'm not good at keeping up with my family, but I always stay in touch with my dog.
i am a medical file clerk.
i enjoy cooking for people.

content.text: I am doing well! How are you?
I am doing well too! I am a graduate student and I am trying to manage my anxiety disorder.
That sounds like a lot to deal with. I am not good at keeping up with my family, but I always stay in touch with my dog.
I am glad you have a good support system! I have a big family, but I do not get to see them very often.
My family came from Greece in the 1950s. I now enjoy gardening and cooking with my favorite ingredients.
I love to cook! I spent most of last year in my workshop, building furniture.
Wow! That sounds really interesting. What kind of furniture did you build?
I built a lot of coffee tables, desks, and bookcases.
That is amazing! I would love to see some of your work.
I can send you some pictures later!
That would be great! I am always looking for inspiration for my own projects.
I am glad! I am always happy to talk about my hobbies.
Me too! I love to meet new people and learn about their interests
